026package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html;
027
028import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
029
030import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.Navigation.PageMode;
031import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.HtmlAttr;
032import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.HtmlId;
033import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.HtmlStyle;
034import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.HtmlTree;
035import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.formats.html.markup.Text;
036import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.Content;
037import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.CommentHelper;
038import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.DocFileIOException;
039import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.DocPath;
040import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.DocPaths;
041import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.NewAPIBuilder;
042
043import com.sun.source.doctree.DocTree;
044
045import java.util.List;
046
047import static com.sun.source.doctree.DocTree.Kind.SINCE;
048
049/**
050 * Generates a file containing a list of new API elements with the appropriate links.
051 */
052public class NewAPIListWriter extends SummaryListWriter<NewAPIBuilder> {
053
054    /**
055     * Constructor.
056     *
057     * @param configuration the configuration for this doclet
058     */
059    public NewAPIListWriter(HtmlConfiguration configuration, DocPath filename) {
060        super(configuration, filename, configuration.newAPIPageBuilder);
061    }
062
063    /**
064     * If the "New API" page is configured this method instantiates a NewAPIListWriter
065     * and generates the file.
066     *
067     * @param configuration the current configuration of the doclet.
068     * @throws DocFileIOException if there is a problem writing the new API list
069     */
070    public static void generate(HtmlConfiguration configuration)
071            throws DocFileIOException {
072        if (configuration.conditionalPages
073            .contains(HtmlConfiguration.ConditionalPage.NEW)) {
074            NewAPIListWriter writer
075                = new NewAPIListWriter(configuration, DocPaths.NEW_LIST);
076            writer.generateSummaryListFile(PageMode.NEW, "new elements",
077                Text.of(getHeading(configuration)), "doclet.Window_New_List");
078        }
079    }
080
081    @Override
082    protected void addContentSelectors(Content content) {
083        List<String> releases = configuration.newAPIPageBuilder.releases;
084        if (releases.size() > 1) {
085            Content tabs = HtmlTree.DIV(HtmlStyle.checkboxes,
086                contents.getContent("doclet.New_API_Checkbox_Label"));
087            for (int i = 0; i < releases.size(); i++) {
088                int releaseIndex = i + 1;
089                String release = releases.get(i);
090                HtmlId htmlId = HtmlId.of("release-" + releaseIndex);
091                tabs.add(Text.of(" ")).add(HtmlTree.LABEL(htmlId.name(),
092                    HtmlTree.INPUT("checkbox", htmlId)
093                        .put(HtmlAttr.CHECKED, "")
094                        .put(HtmlAttr.ONCLICK,
095                            "toggleGlobal(this, '" + releaseIndex + "', 3)"))
096                    .add(HtmlTree.SPAN(Text.of(release))));
097            }
098            content.add(tabs);
099        }
100    }
101
102    @Override
103    protected void addTableTabs(Table<Element> table, String headingKey) {
104        table.setGridStyle(HtmlStyle.threeColumnReleaseSummary);
105        List<String> releases = builder.releases;
106        if (releases.size() > 1) {
107            table.setDefaultTab(getTableCaption(headingKey))
108                .setAlwaysShowDefaultTab(true)
109                .setRenderTabs(false);
110            for (String release : releases) {
111                table.addTab(
112                    releases.size() == 1
113                        ? getTableCaption(headingKey)
114                        : Text.of(release),
115                    element -> {
116                        List<? extends DocTree> since = getSinceTree(element);
117                        if (since.isEmpty()) {
118                            return false;
119                        }
120                        CommentHelper ch = utils.getCommentHelper(element);
121                        return since.stream().anyMatch(tree -> release
122                            .equals(ch.getBody(tree).toString()));
123                    });
124            }
125        }
126    }
127
128    @Override
129    protected void addComments(Element e, Content desc) {
130        addSummaryComment(e, desc);
131    }
132
133    @Override
134    protected Content getTableCaption(String headingKey) {
135        return contents.getContent("doclet.New_Elements",
136            super.getTableCaption(headingKey));
137    }
138
139    @Override
140    protected Content getExtraContent(Element element) {
141        List<? extends DocTree> sinceTree = getSinceTree(element);
142        if (!sinceTree.isEmpty()) {
143            CommentHelper ch = utils.getCommentHelper(element);
144            return Text.of(ch.getBody(sinceTree.get(0)).toString());
145        }
146        return Text.EMPTY;
147    }
148
149    @Override
150    protected TableHeader getTableHeader(String headerKey) {
151        return new TableHeader(
152            contents.getContent(headerKey),
153            contents.getContent("doclet.New_Elements_Release_Column_Header"),
154            contents.descriptionLabel)
155                .sortable(true, true, false); // Allow sorting by element name
156                                              // and release
157    }
158
159    @Override
160    protected HtmlStyle[] getColumnStyles() {
161        return new HtmlStyle[] { HtmlStyle.colSummaryItemName,
162            HtmlStyle.colSecond, HtmlStyle.colLast };
163    }
164
165    private List<? extends DocTree> getSinceTree(Element element) {
166        return utils.hasDocCommentTree(element)
167            ? utils.getBlockTags(element, SINCE)
168            : List.of();
169    }
170
171    private static String getHeading(HtmlConfiguration configuration) {
172        String label = configuration.getOptions().sinceLabel();
173        return label == null
174            ? configuration.docResources.getText("doclet.New_API")
175            : label;
176    }
177}
